Releases.Title: AltarHelper 26-12
Releases.Description:
Rewrote the whole concept of reading mods and regex
Now u can use filter strings like: "(1.6–3.2)% chance to drop an additional Divine Orb|200000|Minion" Or

"#% chance to drop an additional Divine Orb|200000|Minion"

Added a new section for Debugs
Now we can debug with more accuracy with new debug mods, Also, u can use Debug Weight to see the mods calculation on ur altar
Added a section for Filter List

LatestCommit.Message:
Added max draw distance

This will improve render time and reduce the amount of visual glitches due to mobs being far away and being told to draw.

Releases.Title: First Release
Releases.Description:
This plugin can highlight essences that comply with user defined settings.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47175867/211050927-6d5991a8-850b-4c88-b88c-c839a00bfcef.png)

Currently you can choose to highlight according to following criteria:
- The monolith contains one of the following essences : Misery, Envy, Dread or Scorn
- The monolith has X amount of essences.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47175867/211051148-1645b8aa-7e37-4e16-8e80-36e8d3aac1cb.png)

You can also change the size of the text.

To install this plugin drop the folder in your Plugins/Compiled folder.

If you have any questions / remarks please contact Opolusia on PoeHud Discord.

PluginDescriptions.Description: Tags essences if they meet user specified criteria.
